channel.title: anomalies on Leonid Gremyachikh
channel.description: Recent content in anomalies on Leonid Gremyachikh

item.title: Anomaly Prediction
item.description: TL; DR Application of Neural Networks, Machine Learning algorithms, Reinforcement Learning and Natural Language Processing for Detection / Prediction of Anomalies in Storage Area Network by log data. Also, development and testing researched methods for improving Digital Twin of Storage Area Network, methods on chaotic systems, OpenAI Gym wrappers. Research Article in process (2021) Research Article “Online detection of failures generated by storage simulator” (2021) Research Article “SANgo: a storage infrastructure simulator with reinforcement learning support” (2020) Experiments and intermediate results Photo by Denny MÃ¼ller on Unsplash
